string.value: Cassandra says she'll give you a pair of gloves to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary. Go talk to Cassandra to find out more.
Cassandra claims that she can make gloves out of maple leaves. Go collect some maple leaves!
You were told if you have Maple Gage currently equipped or in your Inventory, you can't receive it again. Failed equipment should be thrown away.

By now, everyone must know that MapleStory has reached its 5th Anniversary! To commemmorate, I've prepared a special item. Would you like to see?
#e#t1082252# : #v1082252:##n
#b#L0#These gloves aren't even that great...#l
#k

I knew you'd say that! That's why I've prepared something else as well. It's the #b‘[5th Anniversary] Scroll for Gloves'#k. This scroll is exclusively for the ‘#bMaple Gage#k', which you can obtain from the #e#bMaple Administrator#k#n by trading in Maple Leafs. Oh, and I also have good news and bad news. Why don't I tell you about the good news first?\r\n#b#L0#Good News?#l\n#k

The administrator will supply you with an unlimited number of this scroll during the 5th Anniversary Event. Keep in mind that this scroll has a whopping #b70% success rate!#k. Isn't that great? \r\n#b#L0#So, what's the bad news?#l\n#k

Well, unfortunately, there is a chance that this scroll will destroy the Maple Gage when used. But no need to sweat it, I'll give you more Maple Gages anytime. So, what do you think? Do you want to try?

Okay, great! Bring me 800 #bMaple Leafs#k and I will make it for you right away. You want to know where to find #bMaple Leafs#k? You can obtain them from hunting or by finding them at Maple Hill, which you can reach by having the #bMaple Administrator#k send you. Good luck!
Really? Fine then, it's your loss.
Great, I'll give you the #b‘Maple Gage'#k. You can trade in #bMaple Leafs#k for #b[5th Anniversary] Scroll for Gloves#k, so keep collecting and making gloves!
To make a glove, 800 Maple Leafs are needed. I don't think you have all 800 yet.
